description: Try our easy to follow Flower Garden Sandwiches recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Flower Garden Sandwiches Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together the Marmite and soft cheese in a bowl, then spread over the white bread. Cover with the brown bread and press together firmly. Using a medium-sized cutter, cut out as many flower shapes as you can.
Cut a small circle out of the centre of each sandwich using an apple corer and stick either a cherry tomato half or grape half in the middle.
Arrange on a plate or board on a bed of water cress. Cut small flower shapes from the carrot slices using a small cutter and scatter over the 'grass'.

Thinly spread a little marmite or other yeast extract down one side of 12 breadsticks. Cut 6 slices of wafer-thin ham into strips and wrap around the breadsticks pressing on to the marmite to help it stick. Serve with a selection of raw vegetables such as carrots, snow peas and celery.
